⊣ d(s0, c0)

comment: The topology generated by an extended metric can also be generated by a true metric. Thus, "metrizable topologies" can equivalently be defined in terms of metrics or extended metrics. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
